title: mailbox.start
body:
<<if $mailman_quest_active is 0>>
    Welcome to the automated mail delivery system. 
    SCANNING FOR MAIL...
    ....
    You currently have no letters in your possession.
    Thank you for stopping by.
<<else>>
    <<if $mailman_started_quest is 1>>
        <<if $mailman_finished_quest is 0>>
            Letter accepted. Location approved.
            Please insert stamp...
            ....ERROR....
            Letter will be held until further notice. Please contact your local post office.
            <<set $mailman_finished_quest to 1>>
            <<set $mailmain_quest_active to 0>>
        <<endif>>
    <<endif>>
    <<if $mailman_started_quest2 is 1>>
        <<if $mailman_finished_quest2 is 0>>
            Letter accepted. Location approved. 
            DETECTED PERISHABLE ITEMS. ONE FULL SIZED SEA BASS.
            Your letter should arrive in 1-2 business days. 
            Thank you for working with us. Hope you find a better job, probably won't though.
            Goodbye.
            <<set $mailman_finished_quest2 to 1>>
            <<set $mailmain_quest_active to 0>>
        <<endif>>
    <<endif>>
<<endif>>
